snippet: The civil trial of a former Citigroup banker may not turn out to be the great exposé of the financial crisis, but it will almost certainly show Wall Street's wrongheadedness.
abstract: The civil trial of a former Citigroup banker may not turn out to be the great exposé of the financial crisis, but it will almost certainly show Wall Street's wrongheadedness.

headline.main: If Little Else, Banker's Trial May Show Wall St. Foolishness
headline.print_headline: If Little Else, Banker’s Trial May Show Wall St. Foolishness
